TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit RoleProvider extends System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase
Public MustInherit Class RoleProvider Inherits ProviderBase

summary.span: 定义 ASP.NET 为使用自定义角色提供程序提供角色管理服务而实现的协定。

span.span: Defines the contract that ASP.NET implements to provide role-management services using custom role providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 角色管理旨在使你能够轻松地为 ASP.NET 应用程序使用多个不同的角色提供程序。ASP.NET role management is designed to enable you to easily use a number of different role providers for your ASP.NET applications. 您可以使用 .NET Framework 附带的提供的角色提供程序，也可以实现您自己的提供程序。You can use the supplied role providers that are included with the .NET Framework, or you can implement your own provider. 实现自定义角色提供程序时，需要继承 抽象类。When implementing a custom role provider, you are required to inherit the abstract class. 创建自定义角色提供程序的主要原因有两个。There are two primary reasons for creating a custom role provider. - 您需要将角色信息存储在 .NET Framework 中包含的角色提供程序不支持的数据源中，如 FoxPro 数据库、Oracle 数据库或其他数据源。You need to store role information in a data source that is not supported by the role providers included with the .NET Framework, such as a FoxPro database, an Oracle database, or other data sources. - 需要使用与 .NET Framework 附带的提供程序所使用的数据库架构不同的数据库架构来管理角色信息。You need to manage role information using a database schema that is different from the database schema used by the providers that ship with the .NET Framework. 这种情况的一个常见示例是公司或网站的 SQL Server 数据库中已存在的角色数据。A common example of this would be role data that already exists in a SQL Server database for a company or Web site.

span.span: Implementing a Role Provider

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不需要为继承抽象类的类实现构造函数 。You are not required to implement a constructor for a class that inherits the abstract class. 实现的初始化值 将传递给 方法实现。Initialization values for a implementation are passed to the method implementation.

summary.span: 向配置的 的指定角色添加指定的用户名。

span.span: Adds the specified user names to the specified roles for the configured .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由 类调用，以将指定用户与数据源中的指定角色关联。 is called by the class to associate the specified users with the specified roles at the data source. 角色将添加到已配置的 。Roles are added to the configured . 如果未找到配置的任何指定角色名称 `applicationName` ，则建议提供程序引发 。If any of the specified role names are not found for the configured `applicationName`, we recommend that your provider throw a . 如果任何指定的用户名与所配置的任何指定的角色名称都不关联 `applicationName` ，则建议提供程序引发 。If any of the specified user names are not associated with any of the specified role names for the configured `applicationName`, we recommend that your provider throw a . 如果任何指定的用户名为或为 `null` 空字符串，则建议提供程序引发异常。If any of the specified user names is `null` or is an empty string, we recommend that your provider throw an exception. 如果任何指定的角色名称为 `null` 或为空字符串，则建议提供程序引发异常。If any of the specified role names is `null` or is an empty string, we recommend that your provider throw an exception. 如果你的数据源支持事务，则建议你将每个 add 操作包含在一个事务中，并在任何添加操作失败的情况下回滚该事务并引发异常。If your data source supports transactions, we recommend that you include each add operation in a transaction and that you roll back the transaction and throw an exception if any add operation fails. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的示例实现 。The following code example shows a sample implementation of the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider/CS/odbcroleprovidersnippets.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider/VB/odbcroleprovidersnippets.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置要存储和检索其角色信息的应用程序的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application to store and retrieve role information for.

value.span: 要存储和检索其角色信息的应用程序的名称。

span.span: The name of the application to store and retrieve role information for.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由 类用于将用户和角色与不同的应用程序相关联。The is used by the class to associate users and roles with different applications. 这使多个应用程序能够使用同一个数据库来存储用户和角色信息，而不会在重复用户名或角色名称之间发生冲突。This enables multiple applications to use the same database to store user and role information without running into conflicts between duplicate user names or role names. 多个 ASP.NET 应用程序可以通过在属性中指定相同的值来使用相同的数据库 。Multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same database by specifying the same value in the property. 可以通过编程方式设置该属性，也可以使用属性在 Web 应用程序的配置文件中以声明方式设置该属性 `applicationName` 。The property can be set programmatically, or it can be set declaratively in the configuration file for the Web application using the `applicationName` attribute. 如果未 指定属性，则建议 使用属性值。If no property is specified, we recommend that the property value be used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了属性的示例实现 。The following code example shows a sample implementation of the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider/CS/odbcroleprovidersnippets.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider/VB/odbcroleprovidersnippets.vb#1)]

span.span: Implementing a Role Provider

span.span: The name of the role to create.

summary.span: 针对已配置的 ，将一个新角色添加到数据源。

span.span: Adds a new role to the data source for the configured .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由 类的方法调用 ，以将指定的角色添加到已配置的的数据源 。 is called by the method of the class to add the specified role to the data source for the configured . 如果已为配置的指定角色名称 `applicationName` ，为或为 `null` 空字符串，则建议提供程序引发异常。If the specified role name already exists for the configured `applicationName`, is `null`, or is an empty string, we recommend that your provider throw an exception. 如果指定的角色名称包含逗号，则建议提供程序引发异常。If the specified role name contains a comma, we recommend that your provider throw an exception. 如果您的数据源限制角色名称的长度（例如，通过数据库中表的固定长度列），则建议您在角色名称超出数据源所允许的最大长度时引发异常。If your data source restricts the length of the role name, for example, through a fixed-length column of a table in a database, we recommend that you throw an exception if the role name exceeds the maximum length allowed by the data source. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的示例实现 。The following code example shows a sample implementation of the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider/CS/odbcroleprovidersnippets.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider/VB/odbcroleprovidersnippets.vb#3)]

span.span: If , throw an exception if has one or more members and do not delete .

summary.span: 从数据源中删除已配置的 的一个角色。

span.span: Removes a role from the data source for the configured .

returns.span: 若已成功删除此角色，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the role was successfully deleted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由 和类的方法调用， 以从配置的的数据源中删除指定的角色 。 is called by the and the methods of the class to delete the specified role from the data source for the configured . 当你从数据源中删除某个角色时，请确保你还删除了已配置的用户名和已删除角色之间的任何关联 `applicationName` 。When you delete a role from the data source, ensure that you also delete any associations between a user name and the deleted role for the configured `applicationName`. 如果 `throwOnPopulatedRole` 为 `true` ，并且由参数标识的角色 `roleName` 具有一个或多个成员，则 会引发，而不会删除该角色。If `throwOnPopulatedRole` is `true`, and the role identified by the `roleName` parameter has one or more members, throw a and do not delete the role. 如果 `throwOnPopulatedRole` 为 `false` ，则删除角色（无论是否为空）。If `throwOnPopulatedRole` is `false`, then delete the role whether it is empty or not. 如果指定的角色名称不存在、为 `null` 或为空字符串，则建议提供程序引发异常。If the specified role name does not exist, is `null`, or is an empty string, we recommend that your provider throw an exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的示例实现 。The following code example shows a sample implementation of the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider/CS/odbcroleprovidersnippets.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.IRoleProvider/VB/odbcroleprovidersnippets.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由 类调用，并返回一个角色中用户的列表，其中用户名包含为配置的提供的的匹配项 `usernameToMatch` `applicationName` 。The method is called by the class and returns a list of users in a role where the user name contains a match of the supplied `usernameToMatch` for the configured `applicationName`. 通配符支持包含在数据源的基础上。Wildcard support is included based on the data source. 按用户名按字母顺序返回用户。Users are returned in alphabetical order by user name. 建议您在 `roleName` 数据源中不存在时引发。We recommend that you throw a if `roleName` does not exist in the data source. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了一个示例 实现。The following code example shows a sample implementation. remarks.format: ## Remarks 由 类的方法调用 ，以确定配置的的数据源中是否存在角色名称 。 is called by the method of the class to determine whether a role name exists in the data source for the configured . 如果指定的角色名称为 `null` 或为空字符串，则建议提供程序引发异常。If the specified role name is `null` or is an empty string, we recommend that your provider throw an exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的示例实现 。The following code example shows a sample implementation of the method.
